channel.description: Recent content in blog on Umar Ahmad

item.title: Setting up the blog again
item.description: I recently acquired umarahmad.xyz and move my old blog there. The earlier version of this blog was based on octopress with a lot of handcrafted code. The architecture of octopress along with my excitement of setting up the blog made this a cocktail of all possible plugins and tweaks that I could manage to squeeze into a static site. Copy pasted rake snippets and hacked together web and ruby code gave me what I wanted at the time.
